projects.title: WNFA 3D Virtual Gallery
projects.desc: A 3D website that displays the poster results generated by WNFA at Zhejiang Exhibition Hall from 06.01.2022 to 06.12.2022

projects.title: WNFA Poster Generator
projects.desc: A website that uses neural network, python computer vision libraries and art grid method to convert a poem into a visual poster, powered by Azure serverless computing products.

projects.title: Yonder
projects.desc: A social media web application utilizing RESTful API that allows users to share content from different online platforms with a responsive and accessible UI/UX interface design.

projects.title: Xiaohongshu Userscript
projects.desc: A tampermonkey userscript created to collect and export query result from Xiaohongshu Dandelion

projects.title: MoodSwing
projects.desc: MoodSwing is a Java-based android app designed to record and archive userâ€™s mood in relation to geo location and time. Users can follow each other on MoodSwing and view their friend's mood records.
